title: Predictions for Season 5
body:
{{champion:267}} What are your predictions for 2015 in regards to the new season of league?

What champions will be buffed, nerfed? 
What will we see played?
What pro teams are going to emerge on top in NA? 
What roles are going to be over populated? Underpopulated?
What new champion types do you see emerging?
Any new meta in ranked? In pro games?

Just curious how everyone feels the season is going to go!
